segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool reaching for the cookie jar like it's the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over any second, and he doesn't even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the excitement in his eyes as he grabs another cookie from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's balancing on one foot, stretching as high as he can to reach the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's forgotten all about the danger of falling, completely focused on the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is waiting patiently, her hand outstretched, hoping for a cookie too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they realize how much trouble they'll be in if they get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's plate is already full of cookies, but he keeps reaching for more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at how determined he is, even if it's a bit reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself, but I can see the excitement in his eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost like he's on a mission, and nothing else matters right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is just as excited, even if she's not the one climbing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should warn them, but I don't want to ruin their fun.
segments.speaker: PAR
